casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Antonio BULLOCK. No. 194A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 23, 2016. Jon H. Hunt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bullock, Michael Antonio. Kristin Jo Uicker, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for State of North Carolina.

Roger A. Echols, District Attorney.

*4The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of May 2016."
